name: Dungeon Escape (itch) (CLRed)
description:
This is a puzzle game demo, the player needs to find clues and items in the dungeon, and the goal is to escape the dungeon.

This is the first game I've ever developed! It took two weeks! I really like the stylized scenes I've built. The game is straightforward though, I hope you have fun!

Press E to interact

Press WASD to move.

Have Fun!
